component.name: ConfigItem
component.script:
sub Init() m.name = m.top.findNode("label") m.value = m.top.findNode("value") end sub
sub itemContentChanged() as void data = m.top.itemContent
m.name.text = data.label if data.value = "" m.value.color = "#444444" m.value.text = "Enter a value..." else if data.type = "password" m.value.color = "#ffffff" m.value.text = "********" else m.value.color = "#ffffff" m.value.text = data.value end if end sub
